<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks">

        <acceptance_criteria>Change process is following the process</acceptance_criteria>

        <company display_value="GB3">b771e09e4f6463007e72aa95d310c784</company>
        <description>The process will include:
draft
submit for approval only when all fields are populated.
Assess - will hold both Technical & Management approval
Authorize - Will hold the Customer approval process  
Scheduled - once the change is approved
Implement - auto start / engineer driven - when the change started
Review - when the change is completed
Closed - when the change is successful / closed by Change Management
Cancelled - Change can be cancelled at any point

User will be able to save / submit a change but won't be able to edit any field once submitted for approval besides start date & time
When Change is in Review - Date won't be editable
When change is rejected, it will go back into 'New' state
</description>
        <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 05:00:00</estimated_hours>
